title: Project Borey Rachana
excerpt: Professional video production for films, TVCs, and commercial campaigns.
description: Direct Short Film for Borey Rachana is an upcoming 2026 media production project where I serve as the Assistant Director. I support the director by managing on-set coordination, guiding the shooting schedule, organizing scenes and takes, and ensuring clear communication between departments. My focus is to maintain smooth production flow, keep the team aligned with the creative vision, and deliver efficient, high-quality results from planning to wrap. My role is to keep the production organized, focused, and ready for a smooth post-production process.

title: Gmail & YouTube Channel Recovery
excerpt: Restore suspended Gmail accounts and recover terminated or hacked YouTube channels.

title: Verified Blue Tick Successfully Completed
description:
This project showcases the successful verification of a business Facebook Page with an official Verified Blue Tick.

The page was carefully reviewed and prepared to meet Meta’s eligibility requirements, including brand authenticity, business information accuracy, and compliance with Facebook policies. After completing the necessary verification steps, the page was officially approved and awarded the Blue Tick, confirming it as a trusted and authentic business presence.

This verification helps the business:

Build trust and credibility with customers

Protect the page from impersonation and fake accounts

Increase brand authority and professionalism

Improve confidence for advertising and partnerships

All steps were handled through proper channels and official Meta procedures, ensuring a safe and policy-compliant result.
